title: #288: Seduced: Inside the NXIVM Cult - Part 1
description:
Laura and Jim sit down with filmmakers Cecilia Peck (Director and Showrunner) and Inbal B. Lessner (Executive Producer, Writer and Editor), of the incredible STARZ doc-series “Seduced: Inside the Nxivm Cult”. Laura and Jim talk about the red flags they saw right away with this dangerous so-called “self help group” which slowly indoctrinated, groomed and coercively controlled its members. Cecilia and Inbal were able to get special access to Catherine Oxenberg and her daughter India for this series. India spent seven years inside the Nxivm cult before her mother was able to get the media and law enforcement to bring it and its leader down.

You can watch this amazing documentary series on STARZ with a free trail by going to this link https://amzn.to/3naY1YV.

https://seduceddocumentary.com
